title: Nightmares on Wax - Feelin Good (2013) [FLAC]
description:
Nightmares on Wax - Feelin Good (2013) [FLAC]

  Genre: Electronic
  Styles: Trip-Hop, Downtempo

  Codec: FLAC
  Bit Rate: ~ 900 kbps
  Bit Depth: 16
  Sampling Rate: 44,100 Hz

  01 So Here We Are
  02 Be, I Do 
  03 Master Plan 
  04 Luna 2 (feat. Wolfgang Haffner) 
  05 Now is the Time 
  06 Give Thx 
  07 Eye (Can't See) 
  08 Tapestry 
  09 There 4U 
  10 Om Sweet H(Om)e

  The combined project of George Evelyn and Robin Taylor-Firth, Nightmares on Wax became one of the brightest spots on the post-rave British techno map of the early '90s. NoW's debut album, A Word of Science, was - along with early tracks by LFO, Tuff Little Unit, and Tricky Disco - a crucial bridge between the competing influences of New York house and electro, Detroit techno and soul, London rave and acid, and the burgeoning eclecticism of the years to come. Forming in the late '80s in West Yorkshire as an extension of Evelyn and company's b-boy crew the Soul City Rockers, NoW's first singles, "Dextrous" and "Aftermath," were both highly regarded, and the latter shot into the U.K. pop singles Top 40. The subsequent album laid a good deal of the groundwork for the downtempo experimental hip-hop/electro-funk worked over by Mike Paradinas, Luke Vibert, Spacer, and others, and earned the group a secure spot among techno's select crew of next-step innovators.
